table.name: crm_meeting
table.comment: Meeting details stored here include contact, location, details.

field.name: source_contact_id
field.comment: Contact ID of person scheduling or logging this meeting. This will generally an authenticated user.

field.name: target_contact_id
field.comment: Contact ID of person they are meeting with.

field.name: scheduled_date_time
field.comment: Date and time meeting is scheduled to occur.

field.name: duration_hours
field.comment: Planned or actual duration of meeting - hours.

field.name: duration_minutes
field.comment: Planned or actual duration of meeting - minutes.

field.name: location
field.comment: Where will the meeting be held ?

field.name: details
field.comment: Details about the meeting (agenda, notes, etc).

field.name: status
field.comment: What is the status of this meeting? Completed meeting status results in activity history entry.

field.name: parent_id
field.comment: Parent meeting ID (if this is a follow-up item). This is not currently implemented
